agents.title: Agents
agents.createAgentHelpText: Agents are specialized personas that tailor Roo's behavior. <0>Learn about Using Agents</0> or <1>Customizing Agents.</1>

apiConfiguration.title: API Configuration
apiConfiguration.select: Select which API configuration to use for this agent

tools.title: Available Tools
tools.builtInAgentsText: Tools for built-in agents cannot be modified

roleDefinition.title: Role Definition
roleDefinition.description: Define Roo's expertise and personality for this agent. This description shapes how Roo presents itself and approaches tasks.

description.title: Short description (for humans)
description.description: A brief description shown in the agent selector dropdown.

whenToUse.title: When to Use (optional)
whenToUse.description: Guidance for Roo for when this agent should be used. This helps the Orchestrator choose the right agent for a task.
whenToUse.resetToDefault: Reset to default 'When to Use' description

customInstructions.title: Agent-specific Custom Instructions (optional)
customInstructions.description: Add behavioral guidelines specific to {{agentName}} agent.
customInstructions.loadFromFile: Custom instructions specific to {{agent}} agent can also be loaded from the .roo/rules-{{slug}}/ folder in your workspace (.roorules-{{slug}} and .clinerules-{{slug}} are deprecated and will stop working soon).

exportAgent.title: Export Agent
exportAgent.description: Export this agent with rules from the .roo/rules-{{slug}}/ folder combined into a shareable YAML file. The original files remain unchanged.

importAgent.selectLevel: Choose where to import this agent:

global.label: Global Level
global.description: Available across all projects. If the exported agent contained rules files, they will be recreated in the global .roo/rules-{slug}/ folder.

project.label: Project Level
project.description: Only available in this workspace. If the exported agent contained rules files, they will be recreated in .roo/rules-{slug}/ folder.

globalCustomInstructions.title: Custom Instructions for All Agents
globalCustomInstructions.description: These instructions apply to all agents. They provide a base set of behaviors that can be enhanced by agent-specific instructions below. <0>Learn more</0>
globalCustomInstructions.loadFromFile: Instructions can also be loaded from the .roo/rules/ folder in your workspace (.roorules and .clinerules are deprecated and will stop working soon).

enhance.apiConfigDescription: You can select an API configuration to always use for enhancing prompts, or just use whatever is currently selected
enhance.testPromptPlaceholder: Enter a prompt to test the enhancement

condense.apiConfigDescription: Select which API configuration to use for context condensing operations. Leave unselected to use the current active configuration.

ENHANCE.label: Enhance Prompt
ENHANCE.description: Use prompt enhancement to get tailored suggestions or improvements for your inputs. This ensures Roo understands your intent and provides the best possible responses. Available via the ✨ icon in chat.

CONDENSE.label: Context Condensing
CONDENSE.description: Configure how conversation context is condensed to manage token limits. This prompt is used for both manual and automatic context condensing operations.

EXPLAIN.label: Explain Code
EXPLAIN.description: Get detailed explanations of code snippets, functions, or entire files. Useful for understanding complex code or learning new patterns. Available in code actions (lightbulb icon in the editor) and the editor context menu (right-click on selected code).

FIX.label: Fix Issues
FIX.description: Get help identifying and resolving bugs, errors, or code quality issues. Provides step-by-step guidance for fixing problems. Available in code actions (lightbulb icon in the editor) and the editor context menu (right-click on selected code).

IMPROVE.label: Improve Code
IMPROVE.description: Receive suggestions for code optimization, better practices, and architectural improvements while maintaining functionality. Available in code actions (lightbulb icon in the editor) and the editor context menu (right-click on selected code).

ADD_TO_CONTEXT.label: Add to Context
ADD_TO_CONTEXT.description: Add context to your current task or conversation. Useful for providing additional information or clarifications. Available in code actions (lightbulb icon in the editor) and the editor context menu (right-click on selected code).

TERMINAL_ADD_TO_CONTEXT.label: Add Terminal Content to Context
TERMINAL_ADD_TO_CONTEXT.description: Add terminal output to your current task or conversation. Useful for providing command outputs or logs. Available in the terminal context menu (right-click on selected terminal content).

TERMINAL_FIX.label: Fix Terminal Command
TERMINAL_FIX.description: Get help fixing terminal commands that failed or need improvement. Available in the terminal context menu (right-click on selected terminal content).

TERMINAL_EXPLAIN.label: Explain Terminal Command
TERMINAL_EXPLAIN.description: Get detailed explanations of terminal commands and their outputs. Available in the terminal context menu (right-click on selected terminal content).

NEW_TASK.label: Start New Task
NEW_TASK.description: Start a new task with user input. Available in the Command Palette.

advancedSystemPrompt.title: Advanced: Override System Prompt
advancedSystemPrompt.description: <2>⚠️ Warning: This advanced feature bypasses safeguards. <1>READ THIS BEFORE USING!Override the default system prompt by creating a file at .roo/system-prompt-{{slug}}.

slug.label: Slug
slug.description: The slug is used in URLs and file names. It should be lowercase and contain only letters, numbers, and hyphens.

saveLocation.label: Save Location
saveLocation.description: Choose where to save this agent. Project-specific agents take precedence over global agents.

project.label: Project-specific (.roomodes)
project.description: Only available in this workspace, takes precedence over global

roleDefinition.label: Role Definition
roleDefinition.description: Define Roo's expertise and personality for this agent.

description.label: Short description (for humans)
description.description: A brief description shown in the agent selector dropdown.

whenToUse.label: When to Use (optional)
whenToUse.description: Guidance for Roo for when this agent should be used. This helps the Orchestrator choose the right agent for a task.

tools.label: Available Tools
tools.description: Select which tools this agent can use.

customInstructions.label: Custom Instructions (optional)
customInstructions.description: Add behavioral guidelines specific to this agent.

deleteAgent.title: Delete Agent
deleteAgent.message: Are you sure you want to delete the agent "{{agentName}}"?
deleteAgent.rulesFolder: This agent has a rules folder at {{folderPath}} that will also be deleted.
deleteAgent.descriptionNoRules: Are you sure you want to delete this custom agent?
